title: Silver Package
description: Our Silver Package includes essential wedding planning services such as venue selection, vendor coordination, and day-of coordination. This package is perfect for couples who have already made some arrangements and need assistance with final details.

title: Gold Package
description: The Gold Package is a comprehensive wedding planning service that covers everything from start to finish. We'll assist you with venue selection, vendor management, budget planning, design, and coordination on the big day.

title: Destination Wedding
description: Dreaming of a romantic destination wedding? Our Destination Wedding package is designed for couples who want a unique and memorable wedding in a stunning location. We'll handle all the logistics and planning, so you can enjoy your special day.

title: Intimate Elopement
description: For couples seeking a more intimate celebration, our Elopement package provides personalized planning for a small guest list. We'll help you find the perfect location, officiant, and handle all the details for a beautiful and meaningful elopement ceremony.

title: Themed Wedding
description: Do you have a specific theme in mind for your wedding? Our Themed Wedding package is perfect for couples who want to create a one-of-a-kind celebration. We'll work with you to bring your vision to life, from decor to entertainment.

title: Customized Package
description: Can't find the perfect package? Our Customized Package allows you to mix and match services to create a tailored wedding planning experience. Let us know your specific needs, and we'll design a package just for you.
